response.overview: "Mighty Raju and the Commandos" is a Hindi animated superhero movie focusing on the adventures of Mighty Raju, a young boy with superhuman abilities, as he battles against evil forces. In this particular installment, Raju faces off against Karaati, who has escaped prison and uses his scientific knowledge to control a group of animals, turning them into "K'ommandos" to wreak havoc. Mighty Raju, known for his international fame and growing popularity, must stop Karaati and his animal army from causing further destruction.
response.title: Mighty Raju And The Commandos
